sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details>For example, you may choose to auto fill the assignment group based on the application selected. </details> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001021</number> <replaced_by/> <script>In a workflow, use a Run script activity and set Script to: current.u_manager_s_approval=current.u_requestor_name.manager;</script> <script_2/> <script_type>Workflow</script_type> <short_description>Set a field value in a workflow </short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-12 00:45:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6e851dbb13012a00dd7db5b12244b09c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-14 03:14:29</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
